target: I do not have another 3 star hotel in the centre that meets your requirements. Would you like to try another area?
context: <user> Can you find me a 3 star hotel in the centre? <system> The Gonville Hotel meets your requirements. Would you like me to book you a room? <user> Does it have free wifi? I need wifi. <system> Yes, they do offer free internet. Would you like me to make a booking? <user> Yes. I want to book it for 1 person. I want to stay for 5 nights starting from Wednesday. <system> I am sorry Booking was unsuccessful,can I help you find another place to stay? <user> Yes please. Another 3-star hotel in the centre with free wifi. <system>
